# Equip

This file keeps track of my current stats, equip and potential upgrades.

```{r}
library(warlockr)

my_stats <- list(
  int = 238 + 31 + 16,
  sp = 402 + 59 + 40,
  crit = 5,
  hit = 2
)
unlist(my_stats)

set.seed(42)
compute_statweights(my_stats)
```
